word_mean: 奇异的，矛盾的，反常的：与正常规律相矛盾的

sentence.Network_en: We were a team of individuals — as paradoxical as that sounds.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们是一个保持了个体的团队——尽管这听起来自相矛盾。

sentence.Network_en: He is a paradoxical aesthete as well as a paradoxical moralist.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是一个矛盾的唯美主义者,同时他更是一个矛盾的道德家.

sentence.Network_en: When the superior money has disappeared, the situation becomes very paradoxical.
sentence.Network_cn: 当较优越的货币消失时, 情况便变得有点似是而非了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... panoramic 全景的>狭窄的 paradoxical 荒谬的>普通的 parity 平等>不平衡.
2010钟平考研英语词汇班同步讲义 - 豆丁网 ... Paradox： 矛盾 Paradoxical： 矛盾的第10 页 Legacy： 遗产.
新概念第四册单词总汇[旺旺英语论坛] ... vertical 垂直的 paradoxical 自相矛盾的 tidal 潮水的.
...paradox n. 1.（哲）反论，逆程 2. 自相矛盾的事paradoxical a. 反论的，矛盾的paralytic a. 麻痹的，瘫痪的

list.abs: 你肯定想到了伊斯特林悖论(Easterlin Paradox)。上世纪70年代，经济学家理查德•伊斯特林(Richard Easterlin)发现无法证明社会整体 …
寻找生命的支点：弗兰克... ... 1、去反省( de-reflection) 2、矛盾意向( paradoxical intention) 3、态度改变( attitude diversion).
法国悖论(French Paradox)：在1991年的一期美国 “60分钟时事杂志”('60 Minutes')的电视节目中发布的报告暗示说，红葡萄酒让法国 …
注：法国矛盾(French paradox)：法国人的饮食与其他西方国家一样，都是高热量高脂肪的饮食型态，不过法国人罹患心血管疾病的机 …
艾比林矛盾艾比林矛盾 (Abilene Paradox) 每一个人都发言表示同意的事，有可能是每个人心中都不乐意做的事吗？ 怎麽可能？

entry.tran: 自相矛盾的；似矛盾而（可能） 正确的
entry.def: If something is paradoxical, it involves two facts or qualities which seem to contradict each other.

example.ex: Some sedatives produce the paradoxical effect of making the person more anxious...
example.tran: 一些镇静剂适得其反，加重了患者的焦虑。

example.ex: We were a team of individuals —  as paradoxical as that sounds.
example.tran: 我们是一个保持了个体的团队——尽管这听起来自相矛盾。

means.word_mean: 1. seemingly contradictory but nonetheless possibly true;

sentences.sentence: "it is paradoxical that standing is more tiring than walking"

auth_sentence.content: It's a paradoxical mixture of warm and dour.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's a paradoxical mixture of warm and dour.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's a paradoxical mixture of warm and dour.

auth_sentence.content: I find your last sentence a bit paradoxical though.
auth_sentence.res_content: I find your last sentence a bit paradoxical though.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I find your last sentence a bit paradoxical though.

auth_sentence.content: These statements may sound paradoxical but they are consistent.
auth_sentence.res_content: These statements may sound paradoxical but they are consistent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These statements may sound paradoxical but they are consistent.

Sentence.sentence: The Swedes will find this paradoxical and try to find solutions.
